column5: Cozy private room, very close to the airport and 7 miles from downtown Austin. The room is simple but equipped with everything you would need for a comfortable stay. Double bed, two bed side tables, full closet to tuck away your belongings in. The full bath is shared with another air bnb listing. Bathroom has toiletries and hairdryer. Feel free to use our living room, dining area and kitchen. We also have a nice back patio great for soaking up sun or night drinking.
